title: Authentication & Authorization
description: Verify that data exchange services implement proper authentication and authorization mechanisms.

title: Data Encryption
description: Verify that data transmitted through exchange services is properly encrypted in transit.

title: API Security
description: Verify that APIs used for data exchange follow secure coding practices and input validation.

title: Rate Limiting
description: Verify that data exchange services implement proper rate limiting to prevent abuse.

title: Firmware Extraction
description: Verify the ability to extract and analyze device firmware for vulnerabilities.
